partitions.name: STG_ITEM_SITE_EXTRACT_PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE
partitions.expression:
let
                Source = Sql.Database("REPLACE_WITH_YOUR_SERVER", "REPLACE_WITH_YOUR_DATABASE"),
                Query = Value.NativeQuery(
                    Source,
                    "SELECT a.[SITE_NUMBER], a.[ITEM_NUMBER], a.[DESCRIPTION], a.[UNIT_OF_MEASURE], a.[DATE_CREATED], a.[TAX_IND], a.[UNIT_PRICE], a.[TYPE_CODE], a.[FUNCTIONAL_GROUP], a.[MATERIAL_CLASS], a.[STATUS], a.[SITE_RANK], a.[DATE_LAST_INVENTORIED], a.[QTY_ON_ORDER], a.[QTY_ON_HAND], a.[QTY_AVAILABLE], a.[MINIMUM], a.[MAXIMUM], a.[EOQ_QTY], a.[QA_CODE], a.[QA_LEVEL], a.[CYCLE_IND], a.[SHELF_LIFE_DATE], a.[DATE_LAST_RECEIVED], a.[FERC_CODE], a.[PRIMARY_LOC], a.[SECONDARY_LOC], a.[EXTRA_LOCS], a.[DATE_LAST_APPROVED], a.[APPROVER_ID], a.[APPROVER_BADGE_NUMBER], a.[APPROVAL_SWITCH], a.[QA_CERT1], a.[QA_CERT2], a.[QA_CERT3], a.[QA_CERT4], a.[VALUE_ON_HAND], a.[PREVIOUS_ITEM_ID], a.[QTY_ALLOCATED], a.[CONSUMABLE], a.[SHELF_LIFE], a.[PREVENT_MAINTENANCE], a.[CORPORATE_SWITCH], a.[ITEM_OWNER], a.[SAFETY_IND], a.[UTC_IND], a.[ITEM_DEPT], a.[IN_PROCESS_HOLD], a.[PIT], a.[QTY_EXCESS], a.[NEW_RANK], a.[SUB_STATUS], a.[STRATIFIED_TRANS_COUNT], a.[STRATIFIED_DATE], a.[TOLERANCE_AMOUNT], a.[TOLERANCE_PERCENTAGE], a.[SITE_LAST_UPDATED], a.[QTY_ON_HOLD], a.[ITEM_LAST_UPDATED], a.[UNIT_OF_PROPERTY_NUMBER], a.[UNIT_OF_PROPERTY_IND], a.[DATE_LAST_ISSUED], a.[DATE_LAST_RETURNED], a.[CRITICAL_ITEM], a.[REVIEW_DATE], a.[STOP], a.[SAP_IND], a.[SITE_NUMBER], a.[ITEM_NUMBER], a.[DESCRIPTION], a.[UNIT_OF_MEASURE], a.[DATE_CREATED], a.[TAX_IND], a.[UNIT_PRICE], a.[TYPE_CODE], a.[FUNCTIONAL_GROUP], a.[MATERIAL_CLASS], a.[STATUS], a.[SITE_RANK], a.[DATE_LAST_INVENTORIED], a.[QTY_ON_ORDER], a.[QTY_ON_HAND], a.[QTY_AVAILABLE], a.[MINIMUM], a.[MAXIMUM], a.[EOQ_QTY], a.[QA_CODE], a.[QA_LEVEL], a.[CYCLE_IND], a.[SHELF_LIFE_DATE], a.[DATE_LAST_RECEIVED], a.[FERC_CODE], a.[PRIMARY_LOC], a.[SECONDARY_LOC], a.[EXTRA_LOCS], a.[DATE_LAST_APPROVED], a.[APPROVER_ID], a.[APPROVER_BADGE_NUMBER], a.[APPROVAL_SWITCH], a.[QA_CERT1], a.[QA_CERT2], a.[QA_CERT3], a.[QA_CERT4], a.[VALUE_ON_HAND], a.[PREVIOUS_ITEM_ID], a.[QTY_ALLOCATED], a.[CONSUMABLE], a.[SHELF_LIFE], a.[PREVENT_MAINTENANCE], a.[CORPORATE_SWITCH], a.[ITEM_OWNER], a.[SAFETY_IND], a.[UTC_IND], a.[ITEM_DEPT], a.[IN_PROCESS_HOLD], a.[PIT], a.[QTY_EXCESS], a.[NEW_RANK], a.[SUB_STATUS], a.[STRATIFIED_TRANS_COUNT], a.[STRATIFIED_DATE], a.[TOLERANCE_AMOUNT], a.[TOLERANCE_PERCENTAGE], a.[SITE_LAST_UPDATED], a.[QTY_ON_HOLD], a.[ITEM_LAST_UPDATED], a.[UNIT_OF_PROPERTY_NUMBER], a.[UNIT_OF_PROPERTY_IND], a.[DATE_LAST_ISSUED], a.[DATE_LAST_RETURNED], a.[CRITICAL_ITEM], a.[REVIEW_DATE], a.[STOP], a.[SAP_IND], b.[PO_NUMBER], b.[CHANGE_ORDER_NUMBER], b.[RELEASE_NUMBER], b.[PO_LINE_NUMBER], b.[STATUS_DATE], b.[BU_NUMBER], b.[JOB_NUMBER], b.[PROMISED_DATE], b.[DATE_LAST_REJECTED], b.[DATE_LAST_IN_INVENT], b.[DATE_LAST_RECD_SITE], b.[DATE_LAST_IN_HOLD], b.[DATE_ENTERED], b.[QTY_ORDERED], b.[QTY_RECD_TO_DATE], b.[QA_INSPECTOR], b.[REQUISITION], b.[VENDOR_NAME], b.[PO_TYPE], b.[PO_CLASS], b.[BLANKET_TYPE], b.[BLANKET_BEGIN_DATE], b.[BLANKET_END_DATE], b.[DATE_ROOT_ENTERED], b.[DATE_ROOT_ORDERED], b.[DATE_ROOT_STATUS], b.[DOLLARS_COMMITTED], b.[MAX_DOLLARS], b.[LAST_BLANKET_RELEASE_NUMBER], b.[PO_ROOT_STATUS], b.[REVISION_NUMBER], b.[SERVICE], b.[DOLLARS_RECEIVED], b.[DSR_NUMBER], b.[DSR_HOLD_STATUS], b.[PROMISE_DATE_IND], b.[PRICE_CODE], b.[PROCUREMENT_CODE], b.[QTY_REJECTED_TO_DATE], b.[REQUESTOR_NAME], b.[UNIT_OF_PURCHASE], b.[CONVERSION_FACTOR], b.[PO_NUMBER], b.[CHANGE_ORDER_NUMBER], b.[RELEASE_NUMBER], b.[PO_LINE_NUMBER], b.[STATUS_DATE], b.[BU_NUMBER], b.[JOB_NUMBER], b.[PROMISED_DATE], b.[DATE_LAST_REJECTED], b.[DATE_LAST_IN_INVENT], b.[DATE_LAST_RECD_SITE], b.[DATE_LAST_IN_HOLD], b.[DATE_ENTERED], b.[QTY_ORDERED], b.[QTY_RECD_TO_DATE], b.[QA_INSPECTOR], b.[REQUISITION], b.[VENDOR_NAME], b.[PO_TYPE], b.[PO_CLASS], b.[BLANKET_TYPE], b.[BLANKET_BEGIN_DATE], b.[BLANKET_END_DATE], b.[DATE_ROOT_ENTERED], b.[DATE_ROOT_ORDERED], b.[DATE_ROOT_STATUS], b.[DOLLARS_COMMITTED], b.[MAX_DOLLARS], b.[LAST_BLANKET_RELEASE_NUMBER], b.[PO_ROOT_STATUS], b.[REVISION_NUMBER], b.[SERVICE], b.[DOLLARS_RECEIVED], b.[DSR_NUMBER], b.[DSR_HOLD_STATUS], b.[PROMISE_DATE_IND], b.[PRICE_CODE], b.[PROCUREMENT_CODE], b.[QTY_REJECTED_TO_DATE], b.[REQUESTOR_NAME], b.[UNIT_OF_PURCHASE], b.[CONVERSION_FACTOR] FROM [PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE] a LEFT JOIN [ITEM_SITE_EXTRACT] b ON a.[SITE_NUMBER] = b.[SITE_NUMBER] AND a.[ITEM_NUMBER] = b.[ITEM_NUMBER]"
                )
                in
                Query
